00028    RDF::RDF(System& system) 
00029     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00030       isInitialized_(false)
00031    {}
00032 
00034    void RDF::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00035    {
00036 
00037       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00038       readInterval(in);
00039       readOutputFileName(in);
00040       readParamComposite(in, accumulator_);
00041 
00042       read<PairSelector>(in, "selector", selector_);
00043 
00044       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00045       typeNumbers_.allocate(nAtomType_);
00046 
00047       isInitialized_ = true;
00048    }
00049 
00051    void RDF::setup() 
00052    { 
00053       if (!isInitialized_) {
00054          UTIL_THROW("Object not initialized");
00055       }
00056       accumulator_.clear(); 
00057    }
00058 
00060    void RDF::sample(long iStep) 
00061    {
00062       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00063 
00064          accumulator_.beginSnapshot();
00065 
00066          System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter1, molIter2;
00067          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator   atomIter1, atomIter2;
00068          Vector    r1, r2;
00069          double    dRsq, dR;
00070          Boundary* boundaryPtr;
00071          int       iSpecies1, iSpecies2, nSpecies, i;
00072    
00073          for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00074             typeNumbers_[i] = 0;
00075          }
00076 
00077          boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00078          nSpecies    = system().simulation().nSpecies();
00079 
00080          // Loop over atom 1
00081          for (iSpecies1 = 0; iSpecies1 < nSpecies; ++iSpecies1) {
00082             system().begin(iSpecies1, molIter1); 
00083             for ( ; molIter1.notEnd(); ++molIter1) {
00084                molIter1->begin(atomIter1); 
00085                for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00086                   r1 = atomIter1->position();
00087  
00088                   ++typeNumbers_[atomIter1->typeId()];
00089   
00090                   // Loop over atom 2 
00091                   for (iSpecies2 = 0; iSpecies2 < nSpecies; ++iSpecies2) {
00092                      system().begin(iSpecies2, molIter2); 
00093                      for ( ; molIter2.notEnd(); ++molIter2) {
00094 
00095                         //Check if molecules are the same  
00096                         //if ( &(*molIter2) != &(*molIter1)) {
00097 
00098                            molIter2->begin(atomIter2);
00099                            for ( ; atomIter2.notEnd(); ++atomIter2) {
00100 
00101                               if (selector_.match(*atomIter1, *atomIter2)) {
00102                                  r2 = atomIter2->position();
00103    
00104                                  dRsq = boundaryPtr->distanceSq(r1, r2);
00105                                  dR   = sqrt(dRsq);
00106 
00107                                  accumulator_.sample(dR);
00108 
00109                               }
00110                
00111                            }
00112 
00113                         //}
00114 
00115                      }
00116                   } // for iSpecies2
00117    
00118                }
00119             }
00120          } // for iSpecies1
00121 
00122          // Increment normSum_
00123          double number = 0;
00124          for (i = 0; i < nAtomType_; ++i) {
00125             number  += typeNumbers_[i];
00126          }
00127          normSum_ += number*number/boundaryPtr->volume();
00128 
00129       } // if isAtInterval
00130 
00131    }
00132 
00133 
00135    void RDF::output() 
00136    {  
00137 
00138       // Echo parameters to a log file
00139       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00140       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00141       outputFile_.close();
00142 
00143       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00144       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00145       double nSnapshot = double(accumulator_.nSnapshot()) ;
00146       accumulator_.setNorm(normSum_ / nSnapshot);
00147       if (selector_.pairType() == PairSelector::ALL) {
00148          accumulator_.setOutputIntegral(true);
00149       }
00150       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00151       outputFile_.close();
00152 
00153    }

00158    void RDF::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00159    { ar & *this; }

00164    void RDF::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
